description: These wholesome parsnip and pecan muffins are perfect for breakfast or an afternoon snack and happen to be plant-based too.
name: Parsnip & Pecan Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large orange, juice plus 1 tsp of zest

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 12 hole muffin tin. Mix the milled flaxseed with 3 tablespoons of water in a small bowl and set aside to thicken.
Mix the oil, milk, orange juice and zest in a jug. Whisk the flour, baking powder and soda and 50g of oats together in a large bowl. Stir in the parsnips, pecans and sultanas.
Pour over the milk mix and add the flax mix, stirring well to combine. Scoop the batter into the muffin tin and top each muffin with a sprinkle of oats.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. Cool on a wire rack for 10 minutes and serve.
